name: MyPaint
description: MyPaint is an easy-to-use drawing tool with 57 built-in brushes, digital tablet and infinite canvas. All sorts of poetic images can be drawn and saved as PNG and other image formats by MyPaint.

en_US.description: MyPaint is an easy-to-use drawing tool with 57 built-in brushes, digital tablet and infinite canvas. All sorts of poetic images can be drawn and saved as PNG and other image formats by MyPaint.
en_US.name: MyPaint

zh_CN.description: MyPaint是一个图像绘画工具，操作非常简单。MyPaint内置了57个笔刷，支持手绘板，并且拥有无限尺寸的画布。借助MyPaint您可以绘出各种非常有意境的图片，并且保存为PNG等图片格式。
zh_CN.name: MyPaint
